Posts.Content: I stayed on femara or arimidex for 5 years had all kinds of problems with joint and bone pain.......Since coming off had a stroke and now diagnosed with rhuematoid arthritis.   Was quite healthy before b.c. with joints and all.  wondering if anyone else had ongoing joint issues after femara treatment stopped.  getting ready to do physical therapy again........
Posts.Title: Letrozole/Femara
